title: FS: Rube Manning (Pitching) SGC 86, toughest common in set!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Rube Manning (Pitching) SGC 86, toughest common in set!
posts.post_content: Without a doubt, any card higher graded than a 6 is not tougher than this card.  According to PSA POPs, only one card graded a 7, and only two PSA 8's of all backs! Super sharp card, one of the 8's went recently for over $12,000! Offered at $2500
